title: antarangattilE tantiram
sahitya:
antarangattilE tantiram AghavE Ashai kATTi vandAnE azhagappan


anupallavi

  candak-kavi mAlaiyait-tandadE pOdum enru sallApam sheidanan ellAm arindavan


caraNam    varadakSiNaiyum sIrin varisaigaLum vENDAn manam irundAlE pOdum unadu patiyAn enrAn
paramapadattin enran bhaktik-kuDil pughundAn bhAggiyattAl enadu parttAvAga ughandAn
